chunk-cbcb65bafbe05cd25427e239e5d03d4e.description: Sennrich et al. worked on controlling politeness in machine translation by tagging training data with levels of politeness and are also mentioned in relation to domain adaptation in machine translation systems.

chunk-5315e9b864f1250016a577f6c269cabe.description: Christian Hardmeier is an individual supported by the Swedish Research Council for his work on speaker-gender tags in NMT systems.
